title: Universal Action Music v.1
description: Prepared for the video games and ready to use 20 unique action tracks.
longDescription:
***** Listen Here Demo *****
  • Universal Action Music v.1 is designed to elevate the atmosphere of your games and cinematic projects! This album features 8 unique cinematic tracks, along with their in-game versions, making a total of 16 original compositions. Additionally, you'll find 4 bonus soundscapes to add depth and richness to your projects. Whether for intense action scenes or dramatic moments, this collection will bring a professional touch to your production. Bring your project to life and empower it with music!


  • Other Products:
  • Medieval Fantasy Music v.1 HERE


  • Baran Daymaz
  • bdaymaz520@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 8 Cinematic tracks
  • 8 In-game versions (total 16 unique pieces)
  • 4 Bonus soundscapes
  • High-quality WAV format
  • Perfect for action, drama, and atmospheric scenes


Music List:

  • Escape Prism + Ingame Version
  • Horizon + Ingame Version
  • Hottie + Ingame Version
  • Live Die + Ingame Version
  • Night Drive + Ingame Version
  • Stay Tuned + Ingame Version
  • Victory Harvest + Ingame Version
  • Wars Gone + Ingame Version


Bonus Soundscapes:

  • Waiting War
  • Piano
  • Lost Culture
  • Misty Fog

Number of Audio Wavs: 8 + 8 + 4 (Total 20 Music)

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: Total 33:12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
